strings:
<voice_0x01000E1B><se_low>King Trode: W-What's going on...!?
How did we...
<voice_0x01000E1C><se_def>Ishmahri: This ship, the Moonshadow harp and myself, we are all the same. We are all from the old world.
<voice_0x01000E1D><se_def>Ishmahri: I must thank you for reuniting us ancient ones.

<voice_0x01000E1E><se_def>Ishmahri: ...Now, come. Come to me, times past.
Come to me, ancient ocean. Return once more...

<voice_0x01000E1F><se_low>Yangus: Eh!?
Is this 'arp duff, an' all!?
<voice_0x01000E20><se_def>Ishmahri: ...No! Can it really be beyond even the Moonshadow harp? Ah, but wait...

<voice_0x01000E21><se_def>Ishmahri: Forgive my ignorance.
At first, I saw only a horse. But now I
see that you are truly a noble princess.

<voice_0x01000E22><se_def>Ishmahri: ...Of course.
Magic begins with a word.
Music begins with a voice.
<voice_0x01000E23><se_def>Ishmahri: The beautiful voice of this cursed princess is all this great instrument needs to play its music.

<voice_0x01000E24><se_def>Ishmahri: Princess, please come to my aid.
Sing with me.

<voice_0x01000E25><se_def>Ishmahri: Now it is time for us to part.
I will sing to bless your journey
on the ancient ocean, my children...

<voice_0x01000E26><se_low>Yangus: Love a duck! Stone the crows! Blimey O'Riley!
Wot the 'ell 'appened back there!?

<voice_0x01000E27><se_low>King Trode: Stop your ridiculous blithering!
This is all thanks to my precious Medea!
<voice_0x01000E28><se_low>Yangus: Yeah, well, at least we got the boat up and runnin' now, eh, guv!? Nice!
<voice_0x01000E29><se_high>Jessica: Don't you think it's a bit early to be congratulating ourselves? We still have a lot to do. Like going after Dhoulmagus. Remember?
<voice_0x01000E2A><se_high>Jessica: That's why we went to so much effort to get the ship in the first place.
<voice_0x01000E2B><se_def>Angelo: Well, if Dhoulmagus has left the eastern continent...
<voice_0x01000E2C><se_def>Angelo: ...I say we head for the west and see if we can't catch up with him there.
<voice_0x01000E2D><se_def>Angelo: Wouldn't you say, <hero>?

<voice_0x01000E2E><se_low>King Trode: Right then! It's decided!
We sail for the west! Get to it!
